title: Training For the Training?
detail_text: <:th_ch0102/>Kanan-chan, shall we start today’s training?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Sure. I’m so excited for this new triathlon that I feel the power coming to me already~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Me too!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Ooh, you’re fired up, huh, Riko-chan~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>It’s because I’ve done my best on the training you guys have made this far! I’ve built up my strength and confidence.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Fufu, I guess that training helped reinforce your mental strength too, huh~. Then, maybe I’ll make it harder next time.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Eh!? T-, that is, umm~....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Ahaha, sorry, sorry, I was joking.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>But, even if you do, I’ll still give it my all!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>You’re pretty dependable today, Riko-chan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
